lead_paragraph: Dario Franchitti sustained a concussion in a crash during qualifying for a vintage auto race in England and will miss the Indy Racing League’s season finale Sunday. Franchitti crashed Friday in Goodwood, England. He was driving a vintage Jaguar in the Goodwood Revival, the Andretti Green Racing team said yesterday. A. J. Foyt IV will take Franchitti’s spot in Sunday’s Chicagoland Indy 300 this weekend.
